results.title: Antioxidant effects of simvastatin in primary and secondary prevention of coronary heart disease.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Fifteen subjects with @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ and no obvious @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@CHD@@@ and 29 subjects with @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Stable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina@@@ received 40 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ daily for 12 weeks.

citations.NLM: Tavridou A, Efthimiadis A, Efthimiadis I, Paschalidou H. Antioxidant effects of simvastatin in primary and secondary prevention of coronary heart disease. Eur J Clin Pharmacol. 2006 Jun;62(6):485-9. PMID: 16758266

results.title: Cholesterol lowering and the use of healthcare resources. Results of the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: The Scandinavian @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Survival Study is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial in which @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduced the risk of @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@ by 30% (P=.0003) over the median follow-up period of 5.4 years in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with previous @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ or @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Stable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina pectoris@@@ as a result of a 42% reduction in the risk of coronary @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@deaths@@@ (P=.00001).

citations.NLM: Pedersen TR, Kjekshus J, Berg K, Olsson AG, Wilhelmsen L, Wedel H, Pyörälä K, Miettinen T, Haghfelt T, Faergeman O, Thorgeirsson G, Jönsson B, Schwartz JS. Cholesterol lowering and the use of healthcare resources. Results of the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study. Circulation. 1996 May 15;93(10):1796-802. PMID: 8635258
citations.BibTeX: @article{8635258, title={Cholesterol lowering and the use of healthcare resources. Results of the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study.}, author={Pedersen TR and Kjekshus J and Berg K and Olsson AG and Wilhelmsen L and Wedel H and Pyörälä K and Miettinen T and Haghfelt T and Faergeman O and Thorgeirsson G and Jönsson B and Schwartz JS}, journal={Circulation}, volume={93}, number={10}, pages={1796-802}}

results.title: Reduction of myocardial ischemia with simvastatin in addition to conventional treatment in patients with chronic coronary artery disease.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: These results suggest that the association of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and conventional treatment in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Stable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina@@@ reduces effort-induced @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@, and can be used with this group of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, particularly those considered ineligible for invasive therapeutic intervention.

citations.NLM: Verri V, Cunha AB, Tessarolo LE, Carneiro RC, Romêo Filho LJ. Reduction of myocardial ischemia with simvastatin in addition to conventional treatment in patients with chronic coronary artery disease. Rev Port Cardiol. 2004 Sep;23(9):1089-105. PMID: 15587571
citations.BibTeX: @article{15587571, title={Reduction of myocardial ischemia with simvastatin in addition to conventional treatment in patients with chronic coronary artery disease.}, author={Verri V and Cunha AB and Tessarolo LE and Carneiro RC and Romêo Filho LJ}, journal={Rev Port Cardiol}, volume={23}, number={9}, pages={1089-105}}

results.title: Lack of clopidogrel-statin interaction in patients undergoing coronary stent implantation.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To assess whether @DISEASE_Blood_Platelet_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001791 @@@platelet activation and aggregation@@@ decrease with @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@, and whether there is a reduction of the action of @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@ when associated with @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. METHODS: This prospective study included 68 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Stable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina@@@ with previous use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, or no statin (control group), with previous elective indication of percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI).

citations.NLM: Serrano Júnior CV, Soeiro Ade M, Araújo LF, Jabot B, Rached F, Orii NM, Nicolau JC, Duarte AJ, Ramires JA. Lack of clopidogrel-statin interaction in patients undergoing coronary stent implantation. Arq Bras Cardiol. 2010 Sep;95(3):321-7. PMID: 20721515

results.title: Effects of statins on platelet inhibition by a high loading dose of clopidogrel.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: Seventy-seven @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Stable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina@@@ scheduled for elective coronary stenting were studied.
